skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart riyadh
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Royal Commission for Riyadh City (Smart Riyadh) skill to get updates on Riyadh news, Smart Riyadh project, and Riyadh mega projects like Green Riyadh, the urban code of Riyadh, Riyadh Art, King Abdulaziz Project for Riyadh Public Transport, and upcoming events. To get started, please enable the skill and say, "Alexa, open smart Riyadh".

Royal Commission for Riyadh City is one of the Smart Riyadh city initiatives. The initiative's goal is to leverage the open resources available on the Royal Commission for the City of Riyadh platforms, and integrate them with new voice AI technologies, which supports the English and Arabic language with local dialects.

Using this interactive product, users will stay up to date on Riyadh news and events.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
